item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, November 29, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:

7. BYD launches sodium-ion grid-scale BESS product (107 points | 89 comments)

26. Aftershock II (30 points | 2 comments)
27. Float Self-Tagging (45 points | 42 comments)
28. Using Pandoc and Typst to Produce PDFs (7 points | 3 comments)
29. QwQ: Alibaba's O1-like reasoning LLM (356 points | 259 comments)
